forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and midnight, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between midnight and 5am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
